page.title: 05LEAGRAVE LIBRARY
page.content: {Leagrave Library}was originally built in 1929 and was rebuilt on the same site in 1974.The Library opens 6 days a week:Monday 2pm-7pm;Tuesday to Friday 9am-7pm and Saturday 9am-4pm.There are{9400}readers registered,each allowed up to{10}books at one time,for a three week period.If books are late,fines are charged.The library employs 2 professional Librarians,and 3 full-time and 4 part-time Staff.It has{34,000}books in stock and purchases 4,000 books a year sometimes selling off old books.{20000 books are borrowed each month.The Senior Librarian chooses the new books from Library book suppliers.In Luton,there is a Central Library,5 Branch Libraries including Leagrave,3 Mobile Units and a service for house bound people.
